de.esoco.storage.impl.jdbc

Class JdbcRelationTypes

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.storage.impl.jdbc.JdbcRelationTypes

  • @Annotations.RelationTypeNamespace(value="de.esoco.storage")
public class JdbcRelationTypes
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains JDBC specific relation type declarations.

    • Field Detail

      • SQL_NAME

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> SQL_NAME
        Contains the name to be used in SQL statements for the element on which it is set. This property will have precedence over a more generic storage name that may have been set as StorageRelationTypes.STORAGE_NAME.

      • SQL_DATATYPE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> SQL_DATATYPE
        The SQL-specific datatype for CREATE TABLE statements. This is used by the method JdbcStorage.initObjectStorage(de.esoco.storage.StorageMapping).

      • SQL_AUTO_IDENTITY_DATATYPE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> SQL_AUTO_IDENTITY_DATATYPE
        Contains the expression that is necessary to declare an integer identity datatype in CREATE TABLE statements. This is used by JdbcStorage when initializing the object storage. The default value is the standard SQL expression 'INTEGER AUTO_INCREMENT'.

      • SQL_LONG_AUTO_IDENTITY_DATATYPE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> SQL_LONG_AUTO_IDENTITY_DATATYPE
        Contains the expression that is necessary to declare a long integer identity datatype in CREATE TABLE statements. This is used by JdbcStorage when initializing the object storage. The default value is the standard SQL expression 'BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT'.

      • SQL_IDENTITIFIER_QUOTE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Character> SQL_IDENTITIFIER_QUOTE
        The character that is used to quote identifiers in SQL statement. Defaults to the quotation mark (").

      • SQL_QUERY_PAGING_EXPRESSION

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> SQL_QUERY_PAGING_EXPRESSION
        The SQL expression that can be used to set the offset of the first in a query to support paging through the queried data. If set the expression will be appended to queries that have an ORDER BY clause. It must be parseable by String.format(String, Object...) with a single integer variable (%d) for the query offset. If not set the relation will be initialized to the standard SQL OFFSET clause. To disable paging support this parameter must be set to NULL.

      • SQL_QUERY_LIMIT_EXPRESSION

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> SQL_QUERY_LIMIT_EXPRESSION
        The SQL expression that can be used to limit the number of rows returned by a query. If set it will be used for paging queries in conjunction with the relation SQL_QUERY_PAGING_EXPRESSION.It must be parseable by String.format(String, Object...) with a single integer variable (%d) for the query limit. If not set the relation will be initialized to the standard SQL LIMIT clause. To disable paging support this parameter must be set to NULL.

      • SQL_DATATYPE_MAP

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,java.lang.String>> SQL_DATATYPE_MAP
        A mapping from datatype classes to the corresponding SQL datatype declarations.

      • SQL_CHILD_COUNT_COLUMN

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> SQL_CHILD_COUNT_COLUMN
        Contains the name to be used in SQL statements to store the child count of a certain child attribute.

      • SQL_DISABLE_CHILD_COUNTS

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Boolean> SQL_DISABLE_CHILD_COUNTS
        A flag that indicates that the generation of child count columns should be suppressed. For performance reasons this should only be done for legacy tables that cannot be modified.

      • SQL_OMIT_NAMESPACE

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.Boolean> SQL_OMIT_NAMESPACE
        A flag that can be used on objects with namespaces (e.g. RelationTypes) to signal that the namespace should be omitted when storing the object name.

      • SQL_CREATE_STATEMENT

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> SQL_CREATE_STATEMENT
        Contains an optional create statement to be set one the storage mapping for Storage.initObjectStorage(Class). If set the storage will be initialized with the given statement.

      • SQL_FUZZY_SEARCH_FUNCTION

        public static final org.obrel.core.RelationType<java.lang.String> SQL_FUZZY_SEARCH_FUNCTION
        The name of the SQL function to be used for fuzzy searches.
